items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Lace Release is an alcohol-based adhesive remover designed to gently remove adhesive from mesh.">
items.storedetaileddescription:
Walker Tape®'s Lace Release Remover is an alcohol-based adhesive remover designed to gently remove adhesive from mesh. It is gentle on the skin, yet effective enough to remove adhesives slowly and carefully from delicate mesh systems without leaving any residue. Lace Release ensures the integrity of your clients’ fragile systems.

 

Lace Release is not made for full adhesive removal. It must be paired with another remover to fully remove the adhesive.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Flammable - do not store or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Use in a well-ventilated area. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to cut, broken, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use.

 

Storage

 

Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). SDS sheet is available below.
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

  1. Apply Lace Release over the area you wish to remove.
  2. Wait for one minute, then gently lift the hair system away from the head. The lace mesh will release from the tape or glue, reducing cleanup time.
  3. Apply generously on adhesive area for best results.
  4. Shampoo and rinse!
items.pagetitle: Lace Release - 1.4 fl oz, Dab-On | Walker Tape
